title: Banana and carrot cake
ingredients: ['175g plain flour', '175g soft brown sugar', '3 medium eggs', '2 tsp baking powder', '1 tsp salt', '1 tsp bicarbonate of soda', '175ml sunflower oil', '90g walnut pieces', '2 medium ripe bananas, mashed', '175g grated carrot', 'Icing', '75g cream cheese', '150g icing sugar, sifted', '1 tsp vanilla extract', '75g butter, softened', 'chopped walnuts for decoration']
